projects.description: Tool created to trim orphaned images out of a idproject file. This was my first program written outside of tutorials. I had need to automate a very tedious task at work. This tool reduced the time it took to trim a project.
Displays a randomly selected quote from an array of 5 objects containing quotes. This was my first project for the Treehouse | Full Stack Javascript Tech degree.

Builds pagination and adds search dynamically to html. The page consists of unordered list of students. When page loads it only shows first 10 students and splits them up into groups of ten and adds numbered links at bottom of page. Search field searchs through student names.

Form Validation using jquery/JavaScript. The 3rd project of the Treehouse | Full Stack Javascript Tech degree. This is a cruial lesson in how to work with forms and give user feed back when there are errors.

In this Game you try to guess the phrase, but guess wrong 5 times and you lose. Built using JavaScript Object Oriented Programming. I let my creativity flow on my 4th project of the Treehouse | Full Stack Javascript Tech degree.

This employee directory is populated using randomuser.me api. This is my 5th project of the Treehouse | Full Stack Javascript Tech degree. This lesson taught us how to not only use API data, but also how to work with promises.
